episodes.title: Brainwashed to Kill: Inside a Deadly Cult’s Reign of Terror | True Crime Documentary
episodes.description:
In 1990, the quiet town of Salida, California, became the site of a brutal crime tied to a disturbing cult. Gerald Cruz led a twisted, military-style group that lived in an old labor camp, isolating themselves from society. The cult practiced extreme control, violent punishments, and even followed satanic beliefs. Their leader, Gerald, manipulated and ab*sed his followers, using fear to maintain power.

On May 21, four people were brutally m*rdered in a home invasion orchestrated by the cult. Only one survivor, Donna Alvarez, managed to escape and alert the police. Investigators uncovered chilling evidence at the camp—military manuals, b*mb-making materials, and a sinister "Wheel of Punishment." The murders were part of a larger pattern of abuse and mind control within the cult. Eventually, Gerald and his key followers were arrested and sentenced to death. This case remains a terrifying example of how dangerous cult leaders can manipulate people into committing unspeakable acts.

episodes.title: Jonestown Massacre: Deadliest Cult That Shook The World | Part Three | True Crime Documentary
episodes.description:
In Part 3 of our Jonestown series, we take a closer look at how Jim Jones’ influence grew in California politics and how it eventually led to the move to Guyana. What seemed like an opportunity for a fresh start quickly turned into a nightmare for the people living in Jonestown. Under Jim’s intense control and growing paranoia, the community became a place of unimaginable suffering.

This episode reveals the harsh punishments, the staged government visits, and the constant fear Jim used to manipulate his followers. As his grip on power began to weaken, Congressman Leo Ryan launched an investigation, a decision that would lead to devastating consequences. Join us as we uncover the heartbreaking chain of events that ultimately brought Jonestown to its tragic end.

episodes.title: The Jonestown Massacre: How One Man’s Vision Turned Deadly | True Crime - Part Two
episodes.description:
In Part 2 of the Jonestown and Jim Jones series, we explore how Jim Jones tightened his grip on his followers through fear, lies, and false promises. This episode reveals the harsh reality of life in Jonestown, where people who once had hope began to feel trapped and controlled.

We uncover how Jim created an environment of fear, using staged events and manipulation to silence doubts and keep his followers loyal. As tensions grew, cracks in his leadership started to appear, pushing the community closer to the heartbreaking tragedy that shocked the world.

episodes.title: Jim Jones and Jonestown: The Untold Story of the Cult Massacre | True Crime Documentary (Part 1)
episodes.description:
In this video, we explore the early life of Jim Jones and the events that shaped him. From his difficult childhood in rural Indiana to his fascination with religion and his desire for control, we uncover how he built his following and gained people’s trust. Using his charm and manipulative tactics, Jim created the foundation for what would become the People’s Temple.

This is the first part of the documentary that takes you step by step into the life of Jim Jones, showing how it all began. If you’re curious to learn more about how such a tragedy unfolded, join us for this journey. Part 2 will continue the story, so don’t forget to subscribe and stay tuned.

➤ Check out these videos:

The Case of Mary Stauffer
https://youtu.be/w6QhxNT8bK0

The Case of Aum Shinrikyo Cult

The Case of Ant Hill Kids
